TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISelectionItemProvider

Docs.summary: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to individual, selectable child controls of containers that implement .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern> control pattern.

Docs.related: Support Control Patterns in a UI Automation Provider
Implementing the UI Automation SelectionItem Control Pattern

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddToSelection() cil managed

Docs.summary: Adds the current element to the collection of selected items.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the result of a call to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider.AddToSelection%2A> is that a single item is selected, then send an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementSelectedEvent> for that element; otherwise send an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementAddedToSelectionEvent> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementRemovedFromSelectionEvent> as appropriate.
> [!NOTE] > This rule does not depend on whether the container allows single or multiple selections, or on what method was used to change the selection. Only the result matters.
## Examples The following example code adds the item to a collection of selected items.
:::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip/CSharp/ListItemFragment.cs" id="Snippetaddtoselection"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip/visualbasic/listitemfragment.vb" id="Snippetaddtoselection"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip/CSharp/ListItemFragment.cs" id="Snippetisselected"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip/visualbasic/listitemfragment.vb" id="Snippetisselected":::

Docs.related: Implementing the UI Automation SelectionItem Control Pattern

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSelected As Boolean
public: property bool IsSelected { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether an item is selected.
Docs.value: if the element is selected; otherwise .

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example code returns `true` if this item is in the collection of selected items.
:::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip/CSharp/ListItemFragment.cs" id="Snippetisselected"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip/visualbasic/listitemfragment.vb" id="Snippetisselected":::

Docs.related: Implementing the UI Automation SelectionItem Control Pattern

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RemoveFromSelection() cil managed

Docs.summary: Removes the current element from the collection of selected items.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Send an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementRemovedFromSelectionEvent> as appropriate.
> [!NOTE] > This rule does not depend on whether the container allows single or multiple selections, or on what method was used to change the selection. Only the result matters.
## Examples The following example code removes the item from a collection of selected items.
:::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip/CSharp/ListItemFragment.cs" id="Snippetremovefromselection"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip/visualbasic/listitemfragment.vb" id="Snippetremovefromselection"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip/CSharp/ListItemFragment.cs" id="Snippetisselected"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip/visualbasic/listitemfragment.vb" id="Snippetisselected":::

Docs.related: Implementing the UI Automation SelectionItem Control Pattern

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Select() cil managed

Docs.summary: Deselects any selected items and then selects the current element.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example code clears all items from the collection of selected items and then adds this one.
:::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip/CSharp/ListItemFragment.cs" id="Snippetselect"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip/visualbasic/listitemfragment.vb" id="Snippetselect":::

Docs.related: Implementing the UI Automation SelectionItem Control Pattern

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SelectionContainer As IRawElementProviderSimple

Docs.summary: Gets the UI Automation provider that implements and acts as the container for the calling object.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example code returns the UI Automation provider for the list box that contains this list item.
:::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip/CSharp/ListItemFragment.cs" id="Snippetselectioncontainer"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip/visualbasic/listitemfragment.vb" id="Snippetselectioncontainer":::

Docs.related: Implementing the UI Automation SelectionItem Control Pattern
